item.title: Visual Basic Editor (VBE)
item.description:
Visual Basic Editor or VBE is a separate application in your CAD application.

In this application you write and edit your Macro code.

item.title: VBE Windows
item.description:
In this post we look at the following windows in Visual Basic Editor:

Project Window

When you are working in VBE, each file open is called a Project.
You can think of a project as a collection of objects.

The two most common types of procedures are Sub and Function.
